mapper.update:
update cell_info
gprs_id = #{gprsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cell_index = #{cellIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cell_type = #{cellType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cell_plant = #{cellPlant,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
use_from = #{useFrom,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remain_time = #{remainTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pulse_send_done = #{pulseSendDone,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update cell_info set gprs_id = #{gprsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cell_index = #{cellIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cell_type = #{cellType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cell_plant = #{cellPlant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, use_from = #{useFrom,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remain_time = #{remainTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pulse_send_done = #{pulseSendDone,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT distinct(gprs_id),cell_index,id FROM cell_info where pulse_send_done=0 and gprs_id!=-1 group by gprs_id
